name: Laurence
description:
A short game and my submission to Ben Bonk Game Jam.  Theme of "Trust No One"

In this,  you take the role of Laurence a man in his apartment and things start to go a bit wrong.
The first completed game I have made. I guess it's a bit more on the story side but it was fun to make. It's a little rough and I would like to improve the sound and add more to it at a later date at some point  but it will do for now. I have only been learning game dev for about 1.5 weeks so this was fun to do and satisfying to finish and get uploaded. Thank you for playing it.

All art and music was done by myself. Sound effects were from the public domain.

CONTROLS

Move left - Left Arrow Key

Move Right - Right Arrow Key

Space - Interact

Enjoy and stay beautiful people.
